jobDescription:
Greeting!!


Role & JD::


Design Engineer (SDWAN Engineer)
Location : PAN India
Exp : 10+ Years

Main Callouts:

Work with Site Operations lead to ensure site readiness for SDWAN
Execute questionnaire with site contact to gather technical and functional information
Secure Business approval Agree to deploy dates with Business
Coordinate with Circuit suppliers to ensure circuit delivery and track hardware delivery. Record delivery evidences in SharePoint
Record risks, issues, dependencies (RAID) and escalate when needed
Raise Change Requests for Zscaler change, pre-migration, SDWAN cutover
Raise request for on-site CE engineer, ensure alignment of engineer well before cutover date.
Prepare site runbook and plan per site. Update progress in site planning template per site
Maintain site level updates in SDWAN SharePoint and track RAG status per category of hardware, circuit, overall site level.
Secure operations resources and UAT tester at site ( before cutover )
Coordinate and communicate about change activities, pre-migration (rack and stack) and Site cutover
To schedule and run hypercare calls with GCMC, DE, SOL. Secure AtO after hypercare
Decommissioning of old circuits

BORN - Tech Mahindra is Hiring for SDET for GURUGRAM Location for a Multinational Client

madhuri.durgani@borngroup.com/ SD00886704@Techmahindra.com

Location - PAN INDIA


Shift Timings - Day Shift


Mode - Hybrid


Roles and Responsibilities


We are looking for highly skilled Software Development Engineer in Backend Testing who meets the following criteria,


Top 5 Skills

  • Knowledge on REST API libraries for automation (RestAssured, Karate, etc) - 5+ Years of exp.

Containers (Docker, Kubernetes, Azure etc.)

  • CI/CD Understanding (Git, Git Hub).
  • Java Programming language.
  • Javascript
  • Good understanding of Kafka (Topics).
  • SQL/NoSQL databases.

Job Description:

  • Stronger on backend testing: REST API libraries for automation.
  • Experience understanding different backend infrastructures/architectures including:
    • Sync/Async communication, On Prem / Cloud APIs, Load Balancers, API Firewalls, SQL/NoSql databases.
  • Understanding of Kafka topics (Asynchronous architecture).

  • Java Programming language.
  • Good communication and Leadership on Agile.
  • Good understanding on automation framework (Maven, POM, Hamcrest, TestNG, Utilities, Config files, Polymorfism, Reporting, Logging).

  • Knowledge on Selenium Web Driver
  • Strategize test planning

  • Demonstrate the ability to understand the overall application architecture
  • Collaborate with other SDET Leads in solving common pain points
  • Able to identify the testing/quality gaps and establish the quality goals.

Soft skills:

  • Excellent Communication
  • Proactivity
  • Team work

jobDescription:
Dear Applicant,

Greeting from Einfochips!!(www.einfochips.com)

We have multiple opportunities for DFT Design Engineers

Exp:3-12Yrs

Work Locations: BLR/HYD/NOIDA/Pune/Kochi/Ahmedabad/Indore/Mumbai

JOB description: -

3+ years of hands-on experience in Scan insertion at block level and/or MBIST insertion at block level

  • ATPG and Pattern verification at Block level
  • Debug and enhance DFT architecture and setup DFT flow
  • Debug iJTAG and IEEE 1500 core wrapper-based architecture
  • Pattern diagnosis and debug the ATE pattern failures
  • Very good debugging skills
  • Boundary Scan implementation
  • Create and debug DFT modes timing constraints
  • Scripting for flow automation
  • Should have worked on below Tools:
  • Synopsys tools: DFTMAX, TetraMAX, VCS, Verdi and PT
  • OR Cadence tools: Genus and Modus, NC-SIM/Irun, Sim-Vision, LEC
  • OR Mentor Graphics tools: Tessent tool chain, TestKompress, Questa
  • Ability to work independently on DFT flow enhancement, Full chip/Block level Scan, MBIST. Work closely with DFT lead to solve complex technical issues
  • Technically sound & good team player
  • Familiarity with ATE will be plus

Interested applicants can share resume to Supraja.B@einfochips.com


Regards,

Supraja Boyapati

Senior Executive- TA|| HR

title: Application Developer: SAP ABAP HANA
jobDescription:
As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world s technology leader. Come to IBM and make a global impact!

Your Role and Responsibilities

  • You will design, develop and support application solutions with focus on SAP Netweaver - ABAP.
  • You may also design, develop and/or re-engineer highly complex application components and integrate software packages, programs and reusable objects residing on multiple platforms.
  • Knowledge and experience on SAP Workflow
  • Advance ABAP BADI (Business Add-In)
  • Intermediate Document Extensions
  • ABAP Objects
  • Business Application Programming Interface
  • XI (Exchange Infrastructure)

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

  • 6+ years of experience required.
  • The ABAP on HANA Application Developers would possess the knowledge of the following topics and apply them to bring in value and innovation to client engagements: SAP HANA Technical Concept and Architecture, Data Modelling using HANA Studio, ABAP Development Tools (ADT), Code Performance Rules and Guidelines for SAP HANA, ADBC, Native SQL, ABAP Core data Services, Data Base Procedures, Text Search, ALV on HANA, and HANA Live models consumption.
  • Designing and developing, data dictionary objects, data elements, domains, structures, views, lock objects, search helps and in formatting the output of SAP documents with multiple options.
  • Modifying standard layout sets in SAP Scripts, Smart forms & Adobe Forms
  • Knowledge on ABAP Object Oriented Programming.
  • Development experience in RICEF (Reports, Interfaces, Conversions, Enhancements, Forms and Reports)

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise

  • Experience in working in Implementation, Upgrade, Maintenance and Post Production support projects would be an advantage
  • Understanding of SAP functional requirement, conversion into Technical design and development using ABAP Language for Report, Interface, Conversion, Enhancement and Forms in implementation or support projects

title: Test Engineer
tagsAndSkills: test engineering,document review,test execution,test cases,root cause analysis,case,execution,root cause
jobDescription:
To assist in the preparation of plans, scripts, measures, and other items needed for testing while applying company and industry standards. T Review requirements and provide inputs to Leads. Build test cases, test data & ensure test environment is ready for timely test execution and quality delivery of projects/products.

 Ensure peer reviews of test cases and all related artefacts and document review defects. Execution of test cases as per requirements. Track and log defects while ensuring that the test results are uploaded timely. Participate in analysis and support team in performing root cause analysis. Provide regular updates to team leads for on time and quality delivery. Create supporting documents and knowledge base from testing results for further reference.

title: SaaS Operations Engineer
jobDescription:
We are looking for candidates who have experience in SaaS operation. The candidate should be familiar with a variety of software engineering concepts, including practices and procedures related to Cloud technologies. Willingness to learn while performing a variety of tasks to ensure the success of the project while working as part of a high-performance team is critical.

Your Role and Responsibilities
The successful candidate will be part of the SaaS operations team for IBM Connected Vehicle Insights offering. You will help maintain and support the SaaS offering which is provided as a dedicated SaaS for each customer. You will have a key role in the operations team helping define and implement process to maintain security and compliance, performing day-to-day deliveries and operations on SaaS. Your responsibilities will include:

  • Execute day-to-day tasks on SaaS as part of the global operation team members in multiple geographies in order to keep providing 24 7 support for our customers.
  • Be able to cover as much day-time for Europe as possible (e.g. 8:00 thru 17:00 UTC)
  • Communicate with customers (typically with the IBM s Consulting service team) to solve customer s issues or handle specific requirements for customizations (e.g. custom plug-in deployment) to tailor the service
  • Manage SaaS inventories and security fixes (e.g. kernel/non-kernel OS level patches).
  • On-call support including pager duty alert handling as both of the first and second responders

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

  • Excellent oral and written communication, teamwork skills
  • Strong communication and analytical skills
  • Experience of SaaS operation
  • Experience of on-call support by using pager duty service
  • Basic knowledge of Linux, Java(JVM), network, security and hardware (e.g. VSI and BareMetal on IBM Cloud, etc)

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise

  • Basic knowledge of Maximo, Liberty, DB2 and Hadoop is preferred. Experience of troubleshooting on some of those areas is welcomed.
  • Basic Knowledge of DevOps and its languages/tools (e.g. bash, python, ansible, elastic stack and influxdata) is welcomed.
  • Experience in implementing and executing some of SRE (Site Reliability Engineering) methodology

title: Backend Developer
jobDescription:
At IBM, work is more than a job - it s a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you ve never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world s most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities
As a member of the IBM Security development team, you will be working on back-end services, end-to-end system design, and data analytics. Members of this team tend to have a high degree of fluency in one or more languages (Java and/or C++), database technologies (relational, document, distributed), and a foundational knowledge of cloud technologies such as Kubernetes and OpenShift Container Platform.
You will be responsible for the following:

  • Develop new and maintain current features for IBM Security SOAR Platform
  • Prepare technical requirements and software design specifications.
  • Work in an Agile Environment to deliver solutions in a timely manner
  • Establish strong communication and relationships between engineering, infrastructure, and project/product management teams.

Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Required Qualifications - You must have a minimum of 2-3 years experience in the following:

  • Professional experience programming in Java or C/C++.
  • Good understanding of Object-Oriented Design and programming concepts.
  • Professional experience in web application programming and REST architecture.
  • Strong communication skills.

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
Preferred Qualifications - Minimum of 2 years experience in the following:

  • Experience with Tomcat, Jersey, Hibernate, JTA, Camel, and ActiveMQ.
  • Experience in database schema design, performance, tuning, and scalability.
  • Implementing distributed applications in container environment (Docker/Kubernetes).
  • Experience with agile software development, continuous integration and continuous delivery, and multi-national teams.

title: DevOps Engineer
jobDescription:
At IBM, work is more than a job - it s a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you ve never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world s most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities
The mission of IBM Security is to help organizations thrive in the face of any cyberattack or business crisis. Our industry Security Platform is comprised of containerized software pre-integrated with Red Hat OpenShift. The platform connects to your existing security tools - and through the use of open standards - allows you to search for threat indicators across your hybrid, multicloud environment. It also connects workflows from across the business using a unified interface.
We are growing rapidly and are looking for a highly motivated, dynamic, talented individual to join our Software Development team focusing on our cloud deployment.

The Job - You will work as part of a focused team who are responsible for shaping the architectural path to deliver IBM Security focusing on the delivery of a highly available and horizontally scalable solution capable of running in any cloud environment on OpenShift. It provides a truly unique opportunity to join a successful, rapidly growing organization and fill a pivotal role in its growth and success.
As a DevOps Engineer you will work in a multi-cloud environment. This will include custom solutions, as well as open source DevOps tools (build and deploy automation, monitoring and data gathering for our software delivery pipeline). You will also be contributing to our continuous improvement and continuous delivery while increasing maturity of DevOps and our agile adoption practices.
Applicants should have a bachelor s or a master s degree in computer science or similar fields. You will need to be an excellent collaborator and communicator within your team and with wider stakeholders.

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

  • Experience in cloud software development and delivery.
  • Experience using & building containers and containerised applications.
  • Experience of working with, developing and managing CI/CD pipelines.
  • Programming in Java, Groovy or scripting languages such as Python or bash.
  • Experience in DevOps tools chains such as Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible, Gradle, Git, and Docker.
  • Experience with service-oriented architectures and RESTful web services.

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise

  • You have 5+ years in software development and delivery.
  • You have experience with continuous delivery and automated testing, preferably in multi-cloud deployments.
  • A good understanding of OpenShift, Kubernetes or similar container orchestration technologies.
  • Demonstrable experience with application software and solution scalability, security, monitoring and performance.
  • Agile experience working with Scrum or Kanban in co-located teams as part of a global team.
  • Strong Linux experience.

title: Full Stack Developer
jobDescription:
At IBM, work is more than a job - it s a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you ve never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world s most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Software Engineer (Full Stack) - IBM Security
Software engineers at IBM are the backbone of our strategic initiatives to design, code, test, and provide industry-leading solutions that make the world run today - planes and trains take off on time, bank transactions complete in the blink of an eye and the world remains safe because of the work our software developers do. Whether you are working on projects internally or for a client, software development is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide.

At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. IBM Security IBM Security is a high growth business within IBM. IBM SECURITY is recognized by Gartner, Forester and other consulting firms as the clear leader in Managed Security Services products and services. As a software engineer with IBM SECURITY, you would be joining an exciting growth business within IBM that is a model for Innovation that Matters. In support of this, IBM IBM SECURITY is seeking software engineers who are passionate about Front End development, Backend development, Platform Development, DevOps, and Continuous Integration. Successful candidates should be Collaborators, willing to learn and more importantly adopt best practices, an agile practitioner with a willingness to jump in and figure out complex technical problems, with a focus on delivering results.

title: Magento Developer - eCommerce Websites
placeholders: [{"type":"experience","label":"4-8 Yrs"},{"type":"salary","label":"Not disclosed"},{"type":"location","label":"Kolkata, Mumbai, Visakhapatnam, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Delhi / NCR, Bangalore/Bengaluru"}]
jobDescription:
We are looking to hire a skilled Magento developer to build and maintain eCommerce websites for our clients. As a Magento developer, you will be responsible for liaising with the design team, setting up Magento 1x and 2x sites, building modules and customizing extensions, testing the performance of each site, and maintaining security and feature updates after the installation is complete.


To ensure success as a Magento developer, you should have excellent object-orientated programming knowledge, hold certifications for Java and Magento development, and be able to project manage. Ultimately, a high-level Magento developer can build and maintain a user-friendly eCommerce platform that perfectly meets the needs of the client.

Magento Developer Responsibilities :

- Meeting with the design team to discuss the needs of the company.

- Building and configuring Magento 1x and 2x eCommerce websites.

- Coding of the Magento templates.

- Developing Magento modules in PHP using best practices.

- Designing themes and interfaces.

- Setting performance tasks and goals.

- Troubleshooting integration issues.

- Updating website features and security patches.

Magento Developer Requirements :


- 4-5 years of experience in Magento 2 Development, OOPS, MVC architecture, PHP, MYSQL, OOPS and RDBMS concept.


- Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.

- Advanced knowledge of Magento, JavaScript, HTML, PHP, CSS, and MySQL.

- Experience with complete eCommerce lifecycle development.

- Understanding of modern UIUX trends.

- Knowledge of Google Tag Manager, SEO, Google Analytics, PPC, and AB Testing.

- Good working knowledge of Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator.

- Strong attention to detail.

- Ability to project-manage and work to strict deadlines.

- Ability to work in a team environment.
location: Kolkata, Mumbai, Visakhapatnam, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Delhi / NCR, Bangalore/Bengaluru

title: Sr Manual and Automation Tester
jobDescription:
High-energy environment. The Software Test Engineer should be well versed in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and have experience across the major phases of the SDLC including product requirements, technical design, and testing methodologies.

WHAT YOU'LL DO :

- Ensure new and existing product functionality and components being released are reliable, defect free, and function as documented.

- Create, document, verify, and execute component-level and end-to-end test plans and test cases.

- Work closely with application software engineers and software testers to create test cases, identify, report, and troubleshoot software defects.

- Review requirements specifications and identify gaps and inconsistencies.

- Verify problem fixes in a detailed, efficient, and timely manner.

- Author and execute manual and automated test cases.

- Develop and report test metrics.

WHAT YOU'LL NEED :

- MUST be highly proficient using SQL.

- Selenium or Cucumber Automation testing tool experience.

- Load Runner Experience.

- Jira/Rally/TFS/ALM Project Management tool experience.

- Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or other related field preferred.

- Minimum 3 years of related software testing experience.

- Must possess excellent written and verbal skills to communication with development team.

- Must be able to work independently as well as in a team environment.

- Strong knowledge of quality assurance methodologies, test plans, and debugging is required.

- Previous test automation experience is a plus in a C# ASP.net environment.

KEYS TO SUCCESS :

- Excellent collaboration, communication and presentation skills.

- Be passionate about application development and technology; research and showcase ongoing knowledge of the latest trends, tools and technologies.

- Always present an energetic attitude that facilitates creative collaboration.

- Always be in the know of company goals and objectives.

- An entrepreneurial desire to be part of a growing team and company.

- Takes great pride in the ownership of their work.

title: Sr React Native IOS Mobile Application Developer
jobDescription:
Addisinfotech hiring remote(Work from home) Sr IOS Developers to work multiple client's projects in react native. We are looking for Mobile app developer that has good experience in IOS using the Swift, Objective C, React Native.

Responsibilities:

Work as a React Native Mobile developer with strong hands-on mobile apps & Web apps development experience for entire software development lifecycle
You will design and execute user-facing features for the native app on IOS & Android devices by leveraging mobile operating system frameworks for multi-threading, persisting data, and managing user experience and graphics across multiple screen sizes
Work collaboratively with clients, technology partners to understand and clarify requirements
Design and develop highly scalable Native mobile applications
You will identify, leverage, and successfully evangelize opportunities to improve engineering productivity
Explore and prototype new technologies to incorporate into the development effort

Basic Qualifications:

-- Bachelor's /Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent
-- A minimum of 4+ years of experience in software engineering building Mobile applications
-- Must have 2+ years of hands-on experience in Mobile React native application development using React Native, React and Mobile Development (IOS & Android)
-- Minimum of 2 years of continuous and extensive hands-on experience with expert level use of the following web technologies: React Native, React, HTML5, CSS3, JSON, RESTful API, JavaScript, and JavaScript frameworks (i.e., ReactJS, AngularJS, jQuery)
-- Must possess a minimum 2 years of experience in creating, optimizing, integrating API calls and Familiarity with API design and client/server communication principles
-- Able to demonstrate strong Object-oriented programming skills

Preferred Qualifications:

-- Proficient with software development lifecycle (SDLC) methodologies like SAFe, Agile, Test- driven development
-- Excellent problem solving, analytical and technical troubleshooting skills
-- Able to work well individually and with a team. Good work ethic, self-starter, and results oriented
-- Excellent communication skills are essential, with strong verbal and writing proficiencies
-- IOS & Android native application development using Swift or Objective C, Kotlin or Java
-- Experience with Firebase, setting up Mobile CI/CD & applying/enforcing security standards
-- Experience in API development and using Micro services architecture with technologies like .NET Core, C#, Restful API, PostgreSQL, SQL Server & No-SQL databases

title: Senior Architect - Full Stack
jobDescription:
At IBM, work is more than a job - it s a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you ve never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world s most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Senior Software Architect with 15+ years experience
Provides technical direction and advises management on new and proposed software projects. Develops strategies and long-term plans for researching new or projected operating systems and complete software architecture and provides recommendations.
Conceptualizes, researches, analyzes and proposes new software architecture designs and evaluates and recommends enhancements to existing software architecture. Designs, researches and develops components of software architecture. Coordinates and/or provides technical direction on integration of new complex technologies with overall software architecture.

  • 15+ years of experience in Architecting and developing Large Scale Enterprise Applications
  • Provides technical direction and advises management on new and proposed software projects.
  • Develops strategies and long-term plans for researching new or projected operating systems and complete software architecture and provides recommendations to senior and executive management.
  • Conceptualizes, researches, analyzes and proposes new software architecture designs and evaluates and recommends enhancements to existing software architecture. Evaluates proposed hardware architecture for software impact and provides recommendations on integrating designs with existing architecture.
  • Designs, researches and develops components of software architecture.
  • Coordinates and/or provides technical direction on integration of new highly complex technologies with overall software architecture. Ensures that newly designed or revised databases comply with company standards for design, maintenance, modification and efficiency.
  • Troubleshoots and resolves or recommends highly creative solutions for highly complex software problems that impact software and/or systems architecture.
  • Provides technical direction on product planning for complete software systems.
  • Participates in presenting technical plans and proposals to various technical and non-technical groups and provides recommendations.

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

  • Must have a broad, strong technical knowledge which encompasses Software Development, Dev-Ops, CI/CD/Release automation, Security
  • Comprehensive knowledge of overall software architecture and related databases. Expertise in Java/J2EE, SQL (DB2, Oracle) , NoSQL , Big Data, Kubernetes, Operators, React/Angular, Hyperscalers
  • Deployment architecture for enterprise grade cloud env (public / private)
  • Proven experience in designing & architecting - HA. fault tolerant, scalable systems.
  • Designing for PSR (performance, scalability, reliability.
  • In-depth knowledge of system software engineering methodologies, principles and practices.
  • Comprehensive knowledge of software development tools and Agile Methods
  • Extensive Experience with automation/configuration management using either Chef, Puppet or an equivalent.
  • Experience in application security, transaction management and design patterns
  • Should be able to evaluate open-source tools & technologies, recommend suitable tools based on the requirements.
  • Good written and verbal communication skills.
  • Excellent presentation skills.
  • Expert in management of critical customer situations with the ability to avoid escalations, acting as De-escalation Architect where required.
  • Ability to lead and coordinate multiple complex projects simultaneously.
  • Ability to conceptualize and interpret new architecture designs.
  • Ability to troubleshoot and resolve highly complex software problems that require highly creative solutions.
  • Ability to research, analyze and interpret highly complex technical data for comprehension at various organizational levels and provide recommendations.

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise

  • Comprehensive knowledge of related software languages (Java, C++, Scripting languages & tools (performance, benchmark, profiling)
  • Search technologies like Lucene, Solr, Elastic Search, etc

jobDescription:
At IBM, work is more than a job - it s a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you ve never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world s most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Experience: 3 to 6 Years experience as QA

Do you have a passion for learning and applying modern engineering and testing practices? Are you a technically curious QA engineer? We are looking for passionate QA engineers to work on challenging workflows, creating test scenarios, test samples, and preforming tests related to IBM s employee choice program. We re most interested in people who have a strong background in computer science, who can demonstrate they re passionate about their work, like to share their success, and want to keep learning. If you want to be a part of a team responsible for delighting hundreds of thousands of IBMers, read on.

Your Role and Responsibilities

  • Design, develop and execute test cases-based requirements and user stories.
  • Maintain and enhance automated and manual test suites to stay current with new product features.
  • Troubleshoot and isolate problems encountered during testing, triage and root cause analysis and feedback to the Development team.
  • Identify automation opportunities in different workflow.
  • Define and prepare test data and test environments to support testing.
  • Ensure that our software components are developed and thoroughly tested following best practices and are ready for integration into IBM s best-of-breed solutions that help organizations improve their business outcomes in the global marketplace.
  • Ability to create & execute production like test scenarios.
  • Participate in Agile ceremonies i.e. sprint planning, estimation, etc.
  • Work with test management tools and defect management tools.
  • Participate in software development lifecycle, specifically test design, execution and debugging required to achieve successful implementation of integrated solutions within the product portfolio.
  • Perform web, API, UI, functional, regression, smoke, exploratory and end to end testing within an Agile delivery model.

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

  • 3+ years of relevant industry experience.
  • Experience in system testing including test planning, assessments, test development and maintenance, reporting, defect triage.
  • Hands on experience in authoring and executing the test scenarios/testcases manually.
  • Automation testing experience.
  • Experience with all testing types: black box, white box, regression, integration.
  • Experience of working in Agile, Scrum, DevOps methodologies with global teams.
  • Working knowledge of application servers (WAS, Liberty, Tomcat), database servers (Oracle, DB2).
  • Experience in standard SDLC methodologies like Waterfall, Agile and Scrum.
  • Experience on different technologies (JAVA, REST API, C/C++, Linux)
  • Experience in test management and defect logging tool.
  • Complete understanding of manual testing aspects.
  • Excellent analytical and communication skills.

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise

  • Experience with API testing, API automation, Shell scripting and automation frameworks.
  • Experience on test automation development using Java.
  • Knowledge on unit testing frameworks like Junit/TestNG.
  • Experience Rest API testing
  • Selenium based web automation experience.

jobDescription:
Job Description

Job Overview We are looking for a ReactNative and/or Flutter Mobile App Lead This role requires a broad range of skills and the ability to step into different roles, depending on the size and scope of the project, its primary responsibility is to design and build the next generation mobile applications. Your duties may include collaborating with the design team for new application features, identifying and fixing application bottlenecks, maintaining the core code, and updating application published on the Play Store.

Experience Needed:


  • Minimum 5 years of experience on Mobile Apps development.
  • Minimum 3 years of Experience with ReactNative /Flutter cross-platform mobile development.
  • Experience in implementing video call feature, Bluetooth connectivity, Health Kit (Apple Health, Google Fit) integration in mobile application.
  • Good knowledge in JavaScript/Dart, OOPS concepts good knowledge in any one of the native mobile application developments (Android/iOS Platform) Build reusable ReactNative/Flutter components and front-end libraries for future use.
  • Worked on core JavaScript/Dart and understands basics such as Promise, Events, Asynchronous and basic styling. Create modules in native android/iOS and integrate in ReactNative/Flutter mobile app.
  • Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Android Studio, Visual studio code
  • Experience with Software Development Life Cycle. Experience with unit testing frameworks in JavaScript will be added as advantage Experience with version control tools like GIT.
  • Passionate about writing a readable, maintainable, and well-tested code. Experience in test driven development is preferred. Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
  • Strong analytical skills, good team player.
  • Experience with performance and memory optimization.

placeholders: [{"type":"experience","label":"4-5 Yrs"},{"type":"salary","label":"Not disclosed"},{"type":"location","label":"Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Chennai, Bangalore/Bengaluru"}]
jobDescription:
• Bachelor s Degree with 4+ years experience as System Administration in a Medium to Large Enterprise Environment
  • 2+ years of experience in a virtualization environment
  • Industry certifications such as A+, Network+, Security+, MCTS, MCSA, ITIL V3, etc. a plus
  • Troubleshooting, analysis, and creative thinking skills.
  • Understanding of client server technology
  • Skills and knowledge in Windows server operating systems.
  • Good knowledge of Windows Server OS and services (DNS, DHCP, AD, LDAP, ADFS, CA, IIS, etc.).
  • Experience with Microsoft cloud solutions such as Office 365, Teams, and Azure a plus.
  • Experience with enterprise backup technologies such as Veeam a plus.
  • Experience with other enterprise level technologies such as multi-factor authentication, MDM solution, virus protection, file sharing solutions, server virtualization, etc.
  • Good knowledge and experience with VMware server virtualization technologies; VCP certification a plus
  • Knowledge and experience with VDI solutions a plus.
  • Understanding of technical support practices such as ticket documentation, SLAs, and escalation processes.
  • Knowledge on Network topology and working on network domain is a plus.
  • Quick learner, self-starter, the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Able to work within time constraints and follow set processes and procedures.
  • Customer focused, a team player, and able to work on multiple tasks with minimal supervision.
  • Advanced level analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Ready to work in 24X7 shift (Rotational)

RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Responsible for supporting day-to-day operations of the systems within the scope of the System Administrators Team.
  • Provide Level 1 & 2 support for Windows servers, and enterprise 3rd party systems.
  • Support and maintain core Windows Server OS and services including AD, DHCP, DNS, LDAP, ADFS, etc
  • Support and maintain Microsoft cloud solutions such as Office 365, Teams, and Azure.
  • Managing, and troubleshooting Windows servers.
  • Manage patching of Windows servers and other supported systems as required.
  • Assist in the decommissioning of servers and system resources as needed.
  • Maintain and create documentation as required.
  • Diagnose problems and escalate technical support where appropriate. Own the problem and the resolution promoting end-user satisfaction.
  • Provide timely responses and status updates to end-user and management requests.
  • Follow set policies and procedures when working incidents/requests and ensure proper hand-offs when required.
  • Maintain a professional attitude and provide excellent customer service at all times.
  • Maintain a good work ethic and assisting other engineers and senior staff when needed
location: Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Chennai, Bangalore/Bengaluru

jobDescription:
If you are passionate about technology, constantly seeking to learn and improve skill set, then you are the type of person we are looking for! Join our dynamic team to advance your career to next level.


Educational Qualification

B.E/B.Tech in Computer Science/IT/Electronics Engineering.


Required Skills & Experience

  • 4- 8 years of experience in MongoDB (Development + DBA)
  • Install/configure Mongo dB Community and Enterprise Edition
  • Should have knowledge of Designing schema and suggesting queries/changes to application team
  • Should have knowledge of Indexing and optimization In MongoDB
  • Should Know about Upgrades/Downgrades of Mongo dB version.
  • Must know about Replication and Sharding.
  • Should be able to make complex queries using aggregate and js functions.
  • Should have basic knowledge in any SQL db db like MySQL/PostgreSQL/oracle.
  • Should know about how to manage mongodb servers in perspective of db size and load coming on servers.
  • Candidate should have debugging skills to debug production issues like - High CPU/mem, mongodb stats and replication status etc.
  • Basic Linux commands are a must.
  • Candidate should have basic knowledge of making reports and making excel sheets.

About US

VVDN stands for Voice, Video, Data and Networking. We are a one stop shop for Hi-Tech needs, a leading product engineering and manufacturing company working in various technology domains across the globe. We innovate, design, create and product. Today, VVDN is a family of more than 10,000+ employees working across 10 Design Centres and 5 Manufacturing units across the globe. Our Headquarter, Global Innovation Park (GIP) is located in Manesar, India with an extensive presence in other cities including, Gurgaon, Kochi, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Pollachi, Bhubaneswar and our global footprints include presence across the US, Canada, Japan, S.Korea, Vietnam, Finland, Germany and Taiwan. To know more about us, visit our website: www.vvdntech.com

jobDescription:
DevOps/Site Reliability Engineer - System Administration/Cloud Infrastructure

Immediate or less than 30 days notice period

Responsibilities :

- Act as a cloud system admin (AWS primarily and knowledge of multi-cloud infrastructure).

- Monitoring and maintaining networks and servers.

- Creating and automating alerting and monitoring system logs.

- Building tools to mitigate weaknesses in incident management or software delivery.

- Troubleshooting Support Escalation requests.

- Upgrading, installing and configuring new hardware and software to meet company objectives.

- Implementing security protocols and procedures to prevent potential threats.

- Creating user accounts and performing access control.

- Performing diagnostic tests and debugging procedures to optimize computer systems.

- Documenting processes, as well as backing up and archiving data.

- Developing data retrieval and recovery procedures.

- Designing and implementing efficient end-user feedback and error reporting systems.

- Supervising and mentoring IT department employees, as well as providing IT support.

- Keeping up to date with advancements and best practices in IT administration.

Requirements :

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Information Systems, or similar.

- Applicable professional qualification, such as Microsoft, Oracle, or Cisco certification.

- At least two years' experience in a similar role.

- Extensive experience with IT systems, networks, and related technologies.

- Solid knowledge of best practices in IT administration and system security.

- Exceptional leadership, organizational, and time management skills.

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.

title: Middleware Administrator
jobDescription:
About:


Technology Deployment and Management Service (TDMS) organization is a critical arm of Oracle FLEXCUBE consulting group. TDMS delivers Oracle Technology services for FSGBU product customer, while the applications team focusses on the application customization and setup.

We are looking for a highly capable, self-motivated and independent Senior Middleware Administrators based in India. If you are passionate about Oracle Middleware technology as well as cloud computing, this is the ideal role youve been waiting for. Our MW team supports technology which are available both on-premise and on Cloud. In this role, you will be asked to organize and manage the Middleware instances to meet our objectives and maintain the highest customer satisfaction that is possible. To ensure success as a MW Specialist, you should possess extensive knowledge of Oracle Middleware architecture, as well as having experience in a similar role.

Our Engineers are deep technical domain experts, who are responsible for both explaining and showing how Oracles Cloud Infrastructure Solutions solve real-world business challenges. They work closely with field Cloud Architects to help craft the solution and then continue to collaborate with the customer on implementation of these solutions.


Responsibilities include:

  • In-depth knowledge on Oracle Fusion middleware 11g/12c/14c
  • Hands-on knowledge of Cloud (OCI, AWS or AZURE)
  • Strong Core Oracle WebLogic knowledge (11g, 12c and 14c)
  • Strong experience in troubleshooting JVM performance
  • Strong experience in performing detailed incident analysis with thread dumps and heap dumps of JVM
  • Strong experience in applying Oracle Fusion middleware patches (i.e. Quarterly patches, one-off patches, etc.,)
  • Strong knowledge in installing and configuring Webservers such as OHS, Apache, etc.,
  • Strong knowledge in configuring Data sources, JMS resources such as queues, topics in clustered environment, etc.,
  • Strong knowledge in deploying application and troubleshooting components such as EARs, WARs, with EJBs, MDBs, Restful and Web services.
  • Strong knowledge in configuring SSL certificates in Fusion middleware products.
  • Strong knowledge in WLST, shell / python scripting for automation in monitoring metrics, raising alerts, etc.,
  • Strong Knowledge in OS level resource monitoring (Memory, CPU and I/O) such as NMON, OSWatcher, etc.,
  • Good Knowledge in SSO integration with the application deployment using with Oracle OID, OAM, etc., and familiar with SAML based integration with MS Active Directory, etc.,
  • Good knowledge and exposure to Oracle WebLogic monitoring tools (i.e. OEM, OCI O&M, etc.,)
  • Good knowledge on Application Performance tuning
  • Familiar and basic knowledge in handling Oracle Coherence
  • Familiar and basic knowledge in handling Top Link, Oracle Service Bus, SOA, OAS and Web Center
  • Handled performance SLAs of mission critical application
  • Basic knowledge on Oracle Database (e.g. database connection, SQL/PLSQL)
  • Knowledge of Fusion middleware best practices and industry standard security practices.
  • Hands-on and expertise in Application deployment migrations

Preferred qualifications include:

  • Primary focus on developing customer solutions using Oracle's offerings: Oracle Fusion Middleware
  • Knowledge on Oracle Enterprise Manager Grid
  • Knowledge of best practices in Oracle WebLogic.
  • Knowledge of Database, Cloud Concepts, Autonomous Data warehouse (ADW), Data Integration (ODI/Golden Gate) is an added advantage

Education and Certification:

  • BE/MCA or any computer science related major
  • At least 10+ years of experience as Oracle WebLogic / Fusion middleware products
  • Strong analytical, communication, coordination and interpersonal skills
  • Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail

title:
Python/Django Developer- Product
Development
placeholders: [{"type":"experience","label":"4-8 Yrs"},{"type":"salary","label":"5-15 Lacs PA"},{"type":"location","label":"Pune, Ahmedabad, Mumbai (All Areas)"}]
jobDescription:
Description

NAILBITER is one of the fastest-growing market research technology companies

based in the US. Our technology platform allows manufacturers and researchers to

"see" their consumers make product decisions. Using in-the-moment video,

NAILBITER captures and codes real shopping behavior in-store and online into

actionable metrics. The platform quantitatively codes stated, latent and emotional

decisions, revealing hidden barriers to product success. The resulting consumer and

shopper insights allow marketers and researchers to make immediate decisions that

drive market success. NAILBITER scales behavioral research with new metrics and

norms that have been proven at the world's top CPG brands.


What You Will do:

  • You will be responsible for the development, release, and maintenance of

large-scale software applications.

  • You will be working independently in a fast paced and agile development

environment.


What You Will Need:

  • A team player with minimum 4+ years of working experience in developing,

releasing, and maintaining large-scale software applications.

  • Minimum 2 years of working experience in Python and Python Frameworks

(preferably Django).

  • Proven experience in effective team management.
  • Must have Experience in AWS web Services (like EC2, RDS, Lambda, S3,

LoadBalancer, BeanStalk etc).

  • Experience with creating RESTful endpoints using the Django REST

framework.

  • Strong understanding of OOP Concepts, Data Structure and Design Patterns.
  • Have knowledge of the databases like MySQL, Postgresql etc.
  • Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries.
  • Experience with tools like Celery, Nginx, Gunicorn etc.
  • Keen to explore new technologies.

Who You Are:

  • Action Oriented - Deliver fast, get great results. We embrace the vision,

roadmap to success and the action it takes to make it happen.

  • Intellectually Curious - Seek to learn, love to teach. Were humble and embrace

respectful, radical candour with a mindset of ongoing professional and personal

development.

  • Collaborative - One team, shared mission. We welcome feedback and

understand the value of working together to accomplish more than what is

possible individually.


Who We Are:

  • NAILBITER is replacing traditional Market Research with its Behavioral

Videometrics Platform.

  • Headquartered in Reston VA with offices in NY, Chicago, London, Amsterdam,

Singapore, and Mumbai.

  • Ranked #14 in Top 50 most innovative companies by clients as per the 2022

GRIT report (up from #27 in 2021) out of 4000 Companies.

  • The NAILBITER Tech platform observes Shoppers and Consumers purchasing

FMCG products in-store and online (quantitatively and globally).

  • The video is converted to brand metrics that provide a competitive advantage to

Brand and Insights teams.

  • NAILBITER Videometrics have been validated by leading CPG companies

Reckitt, SC Johnson, Mondelez and others.

  • NAILBITER is a Values-driven employer with servant leadership as a cornerstone

of its philosophy.

  • An inclusive and diverse company culture We work with and celebrate

talented employees from every walk of life.


What We Offer:

  • Limitless growth and learning opportunities.
  • Industry-leading compensation, benefits, and career progression opportunity,

including the option to relocate to international offices.

  • A collaborative and positive culture Your team will be as smart and driven as

you.

  • A chance to make an impact Your work will contribute directly to our strategy.
  • An inclusive and diverse company culture We work with and celebrate talented

employees from every walk of life Learn more at https://nailbiter.com


What Is In It For You:

When you join our team, you’ll have access to a vast array of benefits to help you live

your life well. We encourage continued personal and professional growth through

ongoing learning and development opportunities

We follow a Hybrid work model and you will have the flexibility to work from home most

days or to work from the office as required by the team. You would be required to attend

business or team meetings from the office as and when required. For any more queries

feel free to contact HR team: careers@nail-biter.com

You can also apply to https://nailbiter.bamboohr.com/careers/93

jobDescription:
• Currently, we are looking for a Remote Lead Automation Tester in JS to join our team
  • The customer is a world-leading global provider of market intelligence, deal execution platforms, and investor communication tools to investment banks and corporations around the world

Responsibilities

  • Create overall Automation approach and provide ongoing effort estimations to build out tests for each user story for sprint Demonstrable experience building deterministic, repeatable tests that assert business specifications
  • Closely working with PO/Dev and work toward signing off the stories Proactively learn new languages, libraries, and platforms as needed
  • Adapt quickly to changing requirements Leverage frameworks for Contract Testing (eg PACT / DREDD or equivalent) Implement the above frameworks in CI/CD environments / nightly runs in TeamCity/ GITLAB or Equivalent
  • Maintain and Contribute to existing framework Implement Shift-left approach and execute system under test using API test-doubles/virtualization.

Must have strong

  • Experience working with Test Automation Frameworks, for example Protractor/Webdriver IO/Playwright/Puppeteer
  • Minimum 5+ years of experience in Automation scripting Must have exposure to microservice testing
  • Must have knowledge of mocks/stubs/service virtualization
  • Must be prepared to be a hands-on contributor Practical experience with automated testing of RESTful APIs
  • Strong programming skills/Postman/DB knowledge
  • Experience in version control example Git, bitbucket or any other
  • Ability to define appropriate testing approaches for given requirements
  • Knowledge of JavaScript frameworks such as NodeJS, Angular and TypeScript 1+ years of leadership experience

Nice to have

  • Experience in testing distributed, service-oriented systems will be a plus
  • Experience in Docker would be a plus

title: Network Engineer II
placeholders: [{"type":"experience","label":"5-6 Yrs"},{"type":"salary","label":"Not disclosed"},{"type":"location","label":"Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Chennai, Bangalore/Bengaluru"}]
jobDescription:
We are looking for a Network Engineer-II responsible for designing, configuring, and installing customer-facing Local Area Networks (LAN), colocation, and integration with cloud service providers. The Network Engineer-II will provide technical support and documentation to various departments and users regarding customer networks. In addition, the Network Engineer-II may serve as a liaison to gather network requirements from internal and external customers, vendors, and other third-party providers.
 
JOB REQUIREMENTS:
Key Accountabilities
 
CAPACITY AND CONNECTIVITY:
Work with remote datacenter Rackers to maintain network capacity for Rackspace s shared and cloud environments.
Ensure that customer-dedicated networks are quickly and accurately deployed.
Work with internal and external customers and vendors to establish Rack Connect Global connectivity to the world s leading cloud service providers.
Lead off-premise builds that adhere to Rackspace standards for industry-leading support.
Provide technical knowledge to colocation customers to ensure standardized connectivity into Rackspace infrastructure.
 
DESIGN AND PROVISION:
Provide a technical overview to Sales Rackers and define hardware Bill-Of-Materials required for network builds.
Examine build-out designs for deficiencies and facilitate corrections
Assist colocation customers with connectivity to the Rackspace network.
Work with remote datacenter resources to action hardware and cabling deployments
Update internal documentation with designs and publish for consumption
Update internal tools for deployed hardware, VLAN s, IP s and DNS
Provide datacenter resources with cabling requirements; examine hardware and cabling deployments for accuracy
 
BUILD:
Install software configurations against hardware components
Examine logical configurations for accuracy
Prepare maintenance plan documentation & change management
Examine maintenance plans for accuracy
Examine change management for accuracy
Script maintenance implementations
Work in either a lead role or assisting role during maintenance implementations
 
IMPROVEMENTS:
Update and develop Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) & Methods of Procedures (MOPs)
Develop network standardization practices
Document informational content for nonstandard network designs to be utilized by NOC support
Participate in Root Cause Analysis sessions to achieve better networking practices
 
ADDITIONAL:
Act as escalations point of contact for nonstandard customer deployment and cloud provider connectivity.
Conduct provider testing and deployment of new services
Establish build priority based on customer and business needs
 
Key Performance Indicators (please note your KPI s are the outputs of each of the accountabilities)
Current Rackspace GDCI Network design practices are adhered to or adjusted based on customer requirements.
Maintenance planning is performed with particular attention to customer uptime and proper notification.
All maintenance planning is reviewed by a peer(s) to determine if unknown variables have been introduced and if the maintenance plan is sound.
Demonstrate sound judgment in the role during maintenance activities.
Documentation is created for new, special cases or absent network designs.
 
REQUIREMENTS:
1. Intermediate level experience working with most of the following technologies/applications: MPLS, BGP, LDP, QoS, IPv6, OSPF, vPC , STP, DWDM, EVPN, L2VPN, MPLS VPN, L3VPN, FHRP, VLAN, CDP, port-channels, IS-IS, MPLS Inter-AS, VXLAN, DNS, ACL, GitHub, API s, virtual switching
2. Multi-vendor experience working with the following platforms: Cisco IOS, ASR 1k (IOS-XE), ASR NCS (IOS-XR), Nexus (NX-OS), Arista (EOS)
3. Industry recognized certifications: CCNA desired, CCDA, CCNP, CCDP preferred, CCIE (R&S, SP or DC) highly preferred (or equivalent experience)
4. Minimum 5 - years of recent experience with network design and build-out of LAN/WAN s and/or cloud service provider connectivity.
5. Experience working in service provider, datacenter hosting environment, or large-scale enterprise networks.
6. Experience researching, evaluating, and recommending hardware and/or software solutions supporting large scale deployments and/or remediation s against the LAN/WAN
7. Experience working with network vendors and cloud providers (AWS, Azure, Google) with an understanding of the services, hardware, and software portfolios they provide
8. Ability to identify areas of process improvement and provide input and solution options to streamline work
9. Excellent writing, documentation, and communication skills
10. The ability to communicate well with technical and non-technical peers.
11. Customer service-oriented attitude
12. Must be able to work a flexible schedule, 24x7x365 coverage, including holidays and weekends
13. Experience with network service monitoring systems (Arbor, Zenoss, Syslog, SolarWinds, Splunk, Kibana, WhatsUpGold, etc )
14. High School diploma or equivalent required; University or College degree preferred in the Computer Science or Network Engineering fields.
 
HIGHLY DESIRED:
1. Experience with Lab network modeling
2. Experience with troubleshooting and resolution of network issues
 
Success in the role requires the following personal qualities:
Effective written and verbal communicator
Identifies tasks to accomplish goals and drives tasks to completion
Works well with peers and openly discusses plans to determine a proper path forward
Welcomes performance and personal development feedback for improved outcomes
Ability to identify problems and present options to overcome them

title: Plsql Developer - Banking
jobDescription:
Group Description

Oracle Financial Services Global Business Unit (FSGBU) is a world leader in providing IT solutions to the Financial Services industry. Oracles customers include ten of the top ten Global Banks, ten of the top ten Insurance companies, ten of the top ten Securities firms, five of the top five Mutual Fund companies and four of the top five World Stock Exchanges.


With the experience of delivering value-based IT solutions to over 840 financial institutions in over 130 countries, the FSGBU understands the specific challenges that financial institutions face: the need for building customer intimacy and competitive advantage through cost-effective solutions while, simultaneously, adhering to the stringent demands of a dynamic regulatory environment. Our solutions have the world's most comprehensive and contemporary banking applications and provide a technology footprint that addresses their complex IT and business requirements.


Your Opportunity

This gives you an opportunity to apply your technology knowledge, skills and experience to work in the Banking Product development team with a new generation of Oracle Banking products in next generation architecture built leveraging the latest technologies.



Short description displayed on job tile

Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.


Job Description

  • You possess experience in end-to-end Development and / or Implementation and / or Support activities covering expertise areas such as design of customizations, Coding and Unit testing, executing Test cycle rounds including End of Days, migrations and Integrations for Oracle FLEXCUBE / Core banking products
  • Must have hands-on experience on core Java 8 or above and JavaScript.
  • Hands-on experience in Designing and programming PLSQL applications. Strong skills in SQL.
  • Good knowledge of integration mechanisms such as JMS, web services (SOAP-based and REST services) etc,
  • Hands-on skills in deployment & configuration of middleware products such as application/web servers, service bus, message servers.
  • Good knowledge of Oracle Database Concepts and SQL Tuning.
  • Good knowledge of standards such as XSD, JAX-RS, etc
  • Good knowledge of batch programming concepts.
  • Good knowledge of coding standards, Agile methodologies, source code organization, packaging.
  • Good analytical, grasping, and problem-solving skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • High levels of initiative and creativity.
  • Experience in Core Banking products is preferable.

title: Hiring For Intune Architect (Engineering team)
jobDescription:
Location : Chennai, Bangalore & Pune


Exp : 12+ years


Primary Skill : Intune, Windows Autopilot, Co Management, Colud Management Gateway


Max Budget : 35 LPA


Job Description :


The Technical Architect is part of the transformation and transition team (Engineering team) alongside the Project/Program Manager


Responsible end to end -


- starting from validating and/or gathering requirements (due diligence) from the business stakeholders

- designing a system and produce HLD, LLD, tech note

- Support Build and implementation

- Lead and support Service handover to operations team. Involve in creation of SOP, BIG, SOHB

Main responsibility.

- Working on won business either from a new logo wins or incremental sales on an existing account

- Understand, adhere and contribute to the to Atos engineering framework

- Deliver in agile way

- Attend workshops with colleagues from across the business/Practice/Industry to understand what's needed to meet the needs of system users and, ultimately, our claimants.

- To come up with a technical solution that is realistic, cost effective and fits with the DWP and wider org IT strategy.

- Need to take into account our Departments IT strategy and work closely with portfolio/product managers who look at new products and technologies.

- Need to be commercially aware as hosting and licensing costs can influence the solution

- Responsible to build & implement the solution within the designed architecture.

- Perform POC & various tests on process with help of test cases and prepare documents for same and coordinate with Project/program/transition manager to resolve all issues within required timeframe and inform management of any delays

- Provide technical guidance as and when required on behalf of sub-competency to make sure design & implementations are in line with Atos defined best practice and CTO policy and meet the design requirements.

- Working closely with the respective BAU/CO team to ensure that the technology design being delivered by engineering are aligned with and move the architecture from the current to future state

- Ensures technical quality and assurance by participating in Architecture Governance and Technical Design peer review processes, working closely with customer and internal stakeholders as appropriate.

- Work in the delivery of a project or solution and can support pre-sales activities under the coordination of the Solution Manager/Solution Architect.

- Need to make sure SOP, BIG etc (from technical artefacts) are up to date and need to keep up with vendor's pace.


Job Family Responsibilities:


  • Good experience of designing large scale and complex SCCM/MECM, Intune, Windows 10 designs.
  • Responsible for the design and build of a new SCCM and Window 10 solution, ensuring configuration of existing Intune, as well as Apps packaging / store apps (for all platforms) and Windows 10 Roll out.
  • Work with customers to architect modern desktop management solutions using Windows 10, Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager (MECM) & Intune
  • Experience in designing and setting up Autopilot
  • Familiar with various Use Cases for Autopilot and applicability in various scenarios
  • Configure Autopilot settings in Intune (Creating Device profile, applying profile to on-boarded devices, Policies etc.)
  • Work with OEM to configure and lay out the process of build and white glove
  • Drive Service Acceptance into Business as Usual Operations Support
  • Good experience in deploying of SCCM Current Branch with CMG and CO management
  • Responsible for deploying Operation System (Lite touch installation/Zero touch installation) and SCCM Server Builds
  • Migration/upgrade of SCCM server to latest Current Branch platforms
  • Contribute to New-Builds/migration and upgrades
  • Experience with AD, GPO, MDT and related technologies/tools
  • Application Delivery infrastructure design and deployment
  • Group Policy design and implementation

Candidate must have Architectural level skills in all aspects of the product set including:


  • Microsoft Intune (MAM -WE ,MAM + MDM)
  • ABM - ADE and VPP , Android Enterprise ZTE
  • Microsoft Azure Active directory. Dynamic & static security group creations.
  • Experience in various Conditional access scenarios
  • Designing, deploying, and configuring Windows 10 (autopilot, Azure AD joined and Hybrid).
  • Complaine policy, configuration profiles, custom OMA-URI settings, admx templates deployment from Intune.
  • End to end deployment for client devices

jobDescription:
Roles and Responsibilities

  • Perform SAP HANA programming as required.
  • Support and coordinate the efforts of Subject Matter Experts, Development, Quality Assurance, Usability, Training, Transport Management, and other internal resources for the successful implementation of system enhancements and fixes.
  • Participate in the continuous improvement processes as assigned.
  • Work with team members to analyze, plan, design, develop, and implement solutions to meet strategic, usability, performance, and reliability, control, and security requirements.
  • Create and maintain internal documentation and end-user training materials as needed.
  • Provide input to standards and guidelines and implement best practices to enable consistency across all projects.

Desired Candidate Profile

  • Working experience on XSA Based modelling using Web IDE (HANA 2.0) is must.
  • Working experience of HDI Container and cross container (XSA to XS Classic).
  • Working experience on Git version management.

  • Knowledge in SLT and SDI is essential.
  • Working on Agile/scrum Methodology is desirable.
  • Experience and good knowledge of Performance Tuning and Stress Testing are required.
  • Strong analytical, problem solving and multi-tasking skills, as well as communication and interpersonal skills, is required.

title: Netsuite Technical Consultant
jobDescription:
Work Location: Bangalore / Pune / Ahmedabad

Experience required: At least 7 years


Related Experience. You should have at least 7 years of experience in the software industry as a NetSuite technical resource to finalize business and technical requirements necessary to design, develop, test and implement solutions on the NetSuite platform. You will provide solutions to leverage out-of-the-box NetSuite solutions, as well as when to customize and configure changes in fields, workflows, roles/permissions, page layouts, custom objects, custom record types, reports and dashboards of the products. You will help in release preview and business process testing for ongoing NetSuite upgrades, provide support to the NetSuite staff to assist users, and create comprehensive technical requirements documentation, and user training. You must be well-rounded and not just a developer” as we are a growing organization, and we will need your talents to help us in various capacities.

Internal Stakeholder Management. Your ability to interface with clients and provide solutions that meet businesses’ demands. Excellent problem-solving and requirement-gathering skills.

title: Microservices .NET Developer
tagsAndSkills: Net Mvc,.net api,Net Development,Microservices,development,api management,entity framework,core
jobDescription:
Roles & Responsibilities:


The microservice developer is responsible for the design of Domain-driven design (DDD) and microservice design and implementation.

Scope of Work

  • Familiar with Domain-driven Design (DDD) and microservice design patterns such as CQRS for technical design
  • Comfortable working in an environment that practices Agile development, engaging Product Owner and other stakeholders
  • Experience in MVC/Blazor and Entity framework core
  • Develop all codes according to best practices for software development
  • Develop Unit Testing scripts
  • Update technical documentation
  • Support application after Go-Live till end of Defect Liability Period and application troubleshooting

The ideal candidate should possess:

  • At least 5 years experience with substantial project work in software development
  • Able to adapt Agile processes and changing business needs
  • Open to new ideas and ways of doing things
  • Self-motivated with a positive “can-do” attitude
  • Courage to ask why (reasonably) and not follow orders blindly or sit and wait for instructions
  • Strong knowledge in Azure Microservices architecture related framework and MVC Blazor pages.
  • Good knowledge of best practice coding and DDD design
  • Proficient in technical documentation
  • Hands on experience of Cloud features (Azure cosmos DB/ CI-CD pipelines, Azure Deployment)
  • Certification in related technologies is an added advantage
  • Ability to understand and develop on serverless architecture
  • Experience in integration design patterns with Kafka or Solace
  • Know when to use DevOps and CI/CD to maximize your own productivity or for your squad’s productivity

Technical Skills

  • Design – Domain-driven design, microservices design patterns e.g. CQRS
  • Languages & Framework- EF 6/ .NET API/ MVC/ Restful API/ .NET Core 3 and above, MS/SQL
  • Database – [Any of these] MS SQL/ NoSQL/ AZURE SQL DB
  • Message: Kafka or Solace
  • API Management: Azure cloud-native API Management
  • Other Tools & Scripts – Confluence, Swagger
  • Hands-on Experience in DevOps and CI/CD will be added advantage

title: Front-End Micro-App Engineer
jobDescription:
Front-End Micro-App Engineer

As a Front-End Micro App UI Engineer, you will implement the front end for cutting edge solutions on cloud platforms for some of our Fortune 1000 clients and products. You will have the opportunity to contribute to work that may involve building new cloud solutions, migrating an application to co-exist in the hybrid cloud, deploying a global cloud application across multiple countries or providing design guidance /POC for our managed services team for continuous optimization. Our teams of technologists have a diverse range of skills, and we are always looking for new ways to innovate and help our clients succeed.


Work youll do.

As a Front-End Micro App UI Engineer, you will implement the font end and for our intelligence products (Prebuilt MicroApp-Services compatible with Micro-App Analytics, AI/ML plugins). You will further support proposal development and other pursuit activities. Some of the key areas where Front-End Micro App Engineer will be involved are mentioned below.

  • Design software, creating mockups for front-end (Figma)
  • Build highly modular front end modern architectures (Micro-App Patterns and Development)
  • Work on Front-end programming and scripting languages (React, TypeScript, Java, Python)
  • Work on containerization, container orchestration platforms, Helm (Kubernetes)
  • Work with Git, GitOps, GitLab CI, Argo CD, Trunk-based development

The Team

Deloitte Cloud Delivery Center delivers services for our clients across delivery unit locations in India. It comprises of a next-generation secure cloud-hosting platform, high quality architectural design, development, migration, deployment and managed services delivered to clients across all industries and geographies. We have dedicated teams who can lead the design of the right solution that integrates seamlessly into the cloud, with on-premise applications or in a hybrid cloud ecosystem.


Qualifications and Experience Required:

  • Bachelor's degree, preferably a Science, Technology, Engineering and Math major
  • Experience in software design, creating mockups for front-end (Figma)
  • Exposure to highly modular front end modern architectures (Micro-App Patterns and Development)
  • 6+ years experience in Front-end programming and scripting languages (React, TypeScript, Java, Python)
  • 2+ years experience in containerization, container orchestration platforms, Helm (Kubernetes)
  • 2+ years experience with Git, GitOps, GitLab CI, Argo CD, Trunk-based development
  • 2+ years experience in Linux operating systems
  • 2+ years experience in cloud compute and networking experience

How youll grow

At Deloitte, weve invested a great deal to create a rich environment in which our professionals can grow. We want all our people to develop in their own way, playing to their own strengths as they hone their leadership skills. And, as a part of our efforts, we provide our professionals with a variety of learning and networking opportunitiesincluding exposure to leaders, sponsors, coaches, and challenging assignmentsto help accelerate their careers along the way. No two people learn in exactly the same way. So, we provide a range of resources including live classrooms, team-based learning, and eLearning. DU: The Leadership Center in India, our state-of-the-art, world-class learning Center in the Hyderabad offices is an extension of the Deloitte University (DU) in Westlake, Texas, and represents a tangible symbol of our commitment to our people’s growth and development.


Benefits

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits. Learn more about what working at Deloitte can mean for you.


Deloitte’s culture

Our positive and supportive culture encourages our people to do their best work every day. We celebrate individuals by recognizing their uniqueness and offering them the flexibility to make daily choices that can help them to be healthy, centered, confident, and aware. We offer well-being programs and are continuously looking for new ways to maintain a culture that is inclusive, invites authenticity, leverages our diversity, and where our people excel and lead healthy, happy lives.


Corporate citizenship

Deloitte is led by a purpose: to make an impact that matters. This purpose defines who we are and extends to relationships with our clients, our people and our communities. We believe that business has the power to inspire and transform. We focus on education, giving, skill-based volunteerism, and leadership to help drive positive social impact in our communities.

About Infogain:

Infogain is a Silicon Valley headquartered company with expertise in software platform engineering and deep domain skills in travel, retail, insurance, automotive, and high technology. We accelerate the delivery of digital customer engagement systems using digital technologies such as cloud, microservices, robotic process automation, and artificial intelligence for our clients.

Our unique engagement approach of Listen-Curate-Deliver helps to accelerate the innovation journey of 5 of the worlds largest 50 companies and 24 of the Fortune 500, with several relationships of over 10 years.

We deliver positive business outcomes using rapid prototyping and a solid foundation of DevOps-based software platform engineering that ensure high-quality and on-time delivery.

Our 6000 global employees across the US, UK, Singapore, Middle East and India focus on client value creation, delivery excellence and innovation. Our locations in India have 2700 employees spanning Noida, Pune, Mumbai and Bangalore.

Infogain maintains both strategic and technology partnerships with leading enterprise software providers to deliver value-added solutions. We engage with the world's largest, as well as mid-size, and startup, software providers for building product capability, product marketing, customization, professional services and post-implementation support

jobDescription:
Apache NiFi Developer

Position Description
Candidates with 3-8 years of hands-on experience in Data modelling, ETL Development with Apache Nifi.

Should be able to analyze, debug and fix code.
Good communication skills and ability to work effectively and efficiently in a team. Having CI/CD knowledge is an additional advantage.


Data Engineer - Apache NIFI

Position Description
Position / Job Description: Developer Senior/ Developer Midlevel
Years of Experience : 4+ Years
Location Bangalore / Chennai (Bangalore preferred)
Job Role / Your future duties & responsibilities :
We are looking for a motivated and confident Data Engineers who can
develop data pipelines that help in transporting data from source systems to OG Insights storage.
The pipelines to be built such that they can transport data in batches or as real-time streams.
The candidate should be able to provide solution to productize and also work with team of Platform Engineers, BI Developers and Data Scientists.

Your ability to interact with people/teams and build strong collaborative working relationships with teams and colleagues will be second to none. In this role you will be assigned to a team that works on framework development for long-standing clients.

Responsibilities:

1. Develop pipelines that extract, transform, and load data from source to target storage

3. Optimize load performance as needed
4. Maintain the existing Data pipelines

- Trino
