title: Senior Data Support Analyst
jobDescription:
Purpose of Role

We are a data driven asset management firm with a very wide variety of datasets with varying frequency of updates that essentially drive our research models which ultimately determine the daily trading activity. We also trade a wide range of asset classes like Equities, Futures, Options, FX, Swaps, etc. The Data Operations team is responsible for monitoring and supporting the critical data processes and data quality that is delivered to the Research models. Our Production Systems Group (PSG) team that act as L1 support and provide cover globally. The Data Operations team provides the necessary L2/L3 support to production incidents to PSG. Also, the team gets involved in ongoing SQL/Python development related to our New Business process which involves adding new markets and funds in the Trading and Risk systems. This role is for a Senior Data Support Analyst to work for the Data Operations team. The team is based in India reporting to the Head of Data Operations in London and overlaps with UK business hours.

Most of our existing stack is Java and MS SQL Server based. But we are in the process of migrating the data stack to the Cloud where Python is used more. We expect Java and Python to co-exist in our Technology landscape. The systems are proprietary and built on bespoke internal frameworks, but the direction of travel is more Open Source. Snowflake on AWS will be our primary data store going forward. We use Power BI for reporting and visualization. We also utilize tools like Jupyter notebooks and Ansible for release and deployment automation. We use JIRA for change management and follow an Agile approach to delivery.


Primary Duties

  • Provide 1st and 2nd line support to BAU incidents and provide necessary support to the Production Systems Group (PSG) team.
  • Monitor the daily data quality checks and resolve issues by liaising with third party vendors and PSG team.
  • Support the Corporate actions and Reference data maintenance processes.
  • Introduce new markets and funds into the trading systems which involves SQL and config changes across multiple databases and components.
  • Follow the standard release procedure to roll out changes to the PSG and QA teams using Jupyter notebooks and Ansible
  • Ensure incidents and problems are appropriately tracked in the JIRA system
  • Mentor junior members of the team and contribute ideas to improve existing processes
  • Contribute to root cause analyses and work with development teams to prioritize and release fixes
  • Monitor data vendor change notifications and analyse and assess impact working in conjunction with the development teams
  • Improve productivity, supportability and efficiency by automation of repeatable tasks using tools and scripting preferably in Python
  • Create and improve system and process documentation (Run books, Known Errors, Process Workflows etc)
  • Maintain pro-active communication with relevant stakeholders including external vendors during incident management

General

  • Any other duties commensurate with the post holders position and seniority

Experience, Knowledge & Skills

Essential

  • 7+ years of experience in providing application support primarily dealing with data processes and systems.
  • 4+ years of strong evidence of working with SQL in advanced capacity including complex queries, views and stored procedures and solid understanding of database concepts (preferably 2+ on Snowflake)
  • 4+ years of experience working with scripting languages preferably Python to automate routine BAU tasks.
  • Strong evidence of effective incident and problem management in 1st and 2nd level capacity
  • Experience of both Linux and Windows environments
  • Well organised with the ability to prioritise and manage multiple streams of work independently
  • Ability to handle high pressure, complex environments.
  • Build positive working relationships with external and internal teams
  • Strong problem solving and analytical skills to solve complex issues
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills and be able to quickly understand and retain knowledge of business processes and the technology systems.

Beneficial

  • Experience working with financial market data from vendors like Bloomberg, Refinitiv, Factset, or ICE
  • Experience in handling financial data sets and familiarity with financial instruments (equities, futures, FX, options)
  • Experience working with onshore teams
  • Experience working with Cloud environments preferably AWS
  • ITIL Foundation certification

Educational & Professional Qualifications

  • Educated to degree (or equivalent) level or higher, from a leading university like REC/NIT/IITs/BITS/similar;
  • A degree with mathematical and computing content (e.g. Computer Science, Maths, Physics, Economics)

Key Internal Relationships

The individual will be expected to liaise and/or consult with the following personnel in order for them to fulfil the requirements of their role:

  • Researchers and portfolio managers in macro and equity
  • Other technologists in the data team
  • Other technologists across the company
  • Members of the PSG team
  • Personnel from data vendors

Personal Attributes

  • Collaborative works with colleagues at all levels to assist with their queries and find solutions;
  • Flexible considers all matters on their own merit and not the status quo;
  • Passionate has a genuine desire to add value to the business at every level;
  • Accurate has attention to detail and applies checks to their work;



Location- Kolkata, Pune, Ahmedabad, Chennai, Bangalore/Bengaluru, Delhi / NCR

title: Data Scientist -II
jobDescription:
As a Data scientist- II you will performs statistical analysis, data mining and retrieval processes on a large amount of data to identify trends, figures and other relevant information. You will also perform data analysis on data stored in data warehouses or data centers to solve a variety of business problems, optimize performance and gather business intelligence.
Traits that you have

A team player – I know we only win if we all win. I recognise and value the different perspectives and skills my squad mates bring. It is not about being a hero but jumping in and contributing to the successful delivery of our mission.

An excellent communicator – I know and understand the importance of clear, on-time communication. My spoken and written communication skills stand out for clarity and conciseness.

A collaboration champion – I work closely with my colleagues to ensure alignment and champion the sharing of learning across teams.

Comfortable being uncomfortable – I am comfortable with uncertainty. I have the ability to effectively manage myself through ambiguity by making meaning, building relationships and creating clarity with my peers.

Continuous improvement junkie – I constructively challenge the status quo, I look for better ways of doing things and passionately advocate continuous improvement.

Committed to my own and others’ growth – I strive to stretch and grow myself and others by identifying my own development areas, seeking feedback, and providing feedback to others to help them learn and grow every day.

A problem solver – I am energised by tackling complex problems. I use my critical thinking, network, skills, knowledge, and available data to drive better outcomes for our customers and the product.

Business & Tech curious – I have a wide-angle lens. I am curious about what is happening in the external market and in emerging trends and innovations (technological and otherwise) and how we use this information to better inform our decisions and actions.

Risk savvy – I build sustainable solutions that protect stakeholders and customers and proactively address risks by role-modelling improvements in the product’s overall risk and control environment.

Responsibilities:

Design, Implement and Evaluate models and Design machine learning systems(NLP, text analytics, information retrieval, search, and recommendation systems, Knowledge graph, conversational system, Time-series based modelling, forecasting)
Design, development, evaluate and deploy innovative and highly scalable ML to improve the quality of products.
You should be passionate about working with data sets and be someone who loves to bring datasets together and use machine learning and analytical techniques to answer business questions and deliver actionable user-insights to build the best products and models.
Rapidly prototype integration of latest research in the field of ML/DL into the product.
Work closely with team of high performing data scientist and single ownership to identify opportunities, design, and assess improvements to ML Engine & Products
Role Skills:

3-5 years of hands-on experience in building machine learning systems for large datasets.
Ability to break down and frame business problems into data science solutions and hands-on capability to create MVP out of it and run a DS project end to end independently.
In-depth knowledge on supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms including classification, clustering, and regression.
Experience in NLP (Sequence segmentation, Labeling and parsing, Knowledge extraction, Question answering, Multi text learning, ontology, taxonomy building), Machine Learning.
Experience in Entity Extraction, Entity Linking, Clustering algorithms.
Proficient in Math & Deep Learning (VAE, RNN, LSTM, CNN, attention models, Transfomer etc.), machine learning(svm, random forest), Clustering, topic modeling(LDA, LSA) and graph models.
Experience in Python, Scikit-learn, Pytorch, Keras, Tensorflow
Experience of implementing Deep Learning models into production
Familiarity with distributed computing.
Experience with SQL and/or No-SQL modelling.
Excellent communication, analytical and problem-solving skills.
B.S./B.S.E./MS degree in Applied Math, Data Science, Computer Science, Physics, or Similar Technical Field

Preferred Qualifications

Passion to dive deep to resolve problems at their root.
Experience in Data Governance, Data quality, Model Governance & MLops is a huge plus. Functional knowledge of platforms such as MLFLOW, Hopsworks/Sagemaker feature store/feast/Tecton, Seldon, DVC.
Experience on building fair & explainable ML based product.
Experience on federated learning, differential privacy, reinforcement learning.
Experience on A/B testing, federated learning, differential privacy.
Experience of git, flask, restful APIs.
Experience working in a fast-paced, high tech environment.

title: Principal Data Scientist
jobDescription:
• Bachelor s or Masters degree in Engineering.
  • Own and execute end to end multiple data science projects.
  • Work with Product Managers to refine business problems, identifying data sources and propose an end to end solution.
  • Translate product requirements into analytical requirements/specifications, design and develop required functionality.
  • Leverage technology to automate daily operational activities.
  • Driving best practices across teams for - code development, code versioning, unit tests, testing strategies, pipeline architecture, model development deployment, use of cloud applications, use of AI/ML platforms.
  • Build Framework for Quantitative review for all team related KPIs in terms of OKR, scale.
  • Educating internal and external teams about data driven decisions with help of products developed.
  • Lead and mentor a team of data scientists to build solutions which are robust, proven, scalable, DS driven and high impact.
  • Knowledge sharing inside and outside of MiQ - trainings, blogs, research papers etc

REQUIRED EXPERIENCE

  • 10+ years of experience in solving data science problems using machine learning, data mining algorithms and big data tools.
  • Strong experience with advanced SQL and good experience in big data ecosystem - Hive/Pig/MapReduce, Spark.
  • Experience of having delivered at least one product with involvement in business problem identification, propose solutions and evaluating them, identifying
    required data sources, building data pipeline, visualizing the outputs and taking actions based on the data outputs.
  • Be aware of the latest advancements in ad-tech industry and the changing business needs, and propose plan for new data science backed capabilities with product.
  • Experience in the following query and programming languages is a must - eg SQL, Big Query, Python/ R
  • Thorough knowledge in building optimization solutions.
  • Experience in delivering data science projects leveraging cloud infrastructure.
  • Experience with Agile framework.
  • Candidates with ability to set-up and ensure continuous improvement of MLOps CI/CD processes will be preferred.
  • Experience in advertising or ad-tech industry will be a plus.

GOOD TO HAVE SKILLS

  • Extreme attention to detail, ability to meet deadlines and prioritise workload.
  • Demonstrated high degree of organization and ability to manage multiple, competing priorities.
  • Comfortable working in a startup environment - small teams with changing priorities.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Willingness to try new technologies and languages and ability to grasp and learn quickly.
  • Believes in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with peers.
